items.sentence: Tom understands French better than he can speak it.
You\'re not really going to join the army, are you?
Tom was clever enough to figure out what was wrong.
Tom was in the hospital for three months last year.
Tom was surprised how well Mary could speak French.
Have you ever been in a long-distance relationship?
Tom covered for you while you were in the hospital.
I don\'t think that there\'s anybody who hates Tom.
The last time I saw Tom he was a little overweight.
Tom was convicted of second-degree assault in 2013.
